title: WTB: Remaining 2-T201's on Want List and upgrade list
author: freakhappy

posts.post_title: WTB: Remaining 2-T201's on Want List and upgrade list
posts.post_content:
Looking for graded (PSA, SGC) or raw examples in the VG/VG-EX range, but do prefer graded

Here is what I have remaining until I complete the set:

[STRIKE]Evers/Chance[/STRIKE]
Cobb/Crawford
[STRIKE]Bresnahan/Huggins[/STRIKE]
Lajoie/Falkenberg
[STRIKE]Kling/Cole[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Gaspar/Clarke[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Johnson/Street[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Brown/Hoffman[/STRIKE]

Here is a list of cards that I would like to upgrade to VG/VG-EX range:

Downs/Odwell
Miller/Herzog
[STRIKE]Hickman/Hinchman[/STRIKE]
Wiltse/Merkle
[STRIKE]Donovan/Stroud[/STRIKE]
Killian/Fitzpatrick


If you have any of these, sent me a PM or email (cavelyon@aol.com) and we can go from there...thanks!

Mike
One knocked off the list...seven to go
Anyone have one or more they would like to sell?
Still looking for the remaining seven....

Thanks to everyone so far that has contacted me so far...I definitely appreciate it!

Please contact me if you have one or more of these to help me complete this set :D
Bump....would love to add another one or possibly two :D

It is funny to see Kling/Cole on your list.  I remember completing that set 15-20 years ago and that was the last one I needed as well.  That was definitely the toughest one in the set as far as pre-internet collecting goes.

Good luck completing the set!

Chris
So close...anyone want to help me finish the set?  Two big boys left...
Two left to close out the set...and some upgrades as well.  I'd like to get a Cobb/Crawford in grade 2-3 if possible and Lajoie/Falkenberg in 2-4.  Thanks!
